h1: How Many Calories in Bud Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Bud Light, chilled, no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; alcohol content affects metabolism. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 fl oz Bud Light beer contains ~110 kcal and 6.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Budweiser (higher carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories is in one Bud Light beer?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal per standard 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Bud Light beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 6.6 g of carbohydrates per 12 fl oz, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Bud Light beer have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has ~1.3 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Bud Light?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 16 oz pint has ~147 kcal, while 12 oz is 110 kcal.

faqs.q: Is Bud Light lower calorie than other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, at 110 kcal, it's lighter than regular beers like Budweiser (150 kcal per 12 oz).
